content: {"locationId": "11619", "organizationId": "9114", "name": "Champlain Housing Trust", "address1": "27 Susie Wilson Rd.", "address2": "", "city": "Essex Junction", "state": "VT", "zipCode": "05452", "country": null, "phone": "802-861-7322", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://getahome.org", "latitude": "44.50655", "longitude": "-73.13418", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Susan's Pantry is available to residents of Champlain Housing Trust (CHT) properties.  It is located at Susan's Place, 27 Susie Wilson Road, Essex, VT.  The pantry is open two Thursdays a month from 10:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. Please email suey.howe@champlainghousingtrust.org (or call / text 802 338-7350) with any questions.  May 22, June 12 & 26, July 10 & 31, August 14 & 28, September 11 & 25, October 9 & 23. November 6 & 20, December 4 & 18", "notes": "CHT residents complete a registration form at their first visit, before shopping. The following expectations help ensure a positive experience for all shoppers:    Provide your name and CHT address to CHT staff when you arrive.  Five residents / households can shop in the pantry at a time.  Help yourself to items in It\u2019s Susan\u2019s Book Nook (ISBN) and the Free Market before and after you shop.  CHT staff will call your name (or shopper number if you prefer) when it is your turn to enter the pantry.  Schedule appointments to meet with Hannah outside pantry hours as a courtesy to waiting shoppers.  Put your selected items in the provided shopping cart or plastic basket.  When you finish shopping, CHT staff will help you put items in your bags or those available in the pantry.  Susan\u2019s Pantry shopping carts and basket are for use in the pantry.", "contactName": "Suey Howe", "contactPhone": "802-338-7350", "contactEmail": "suey.howe@champlainhousingtrust.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 73, "regionName": "Vermont Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "0372d5bd-e181-4692-bc7f-4880d66560ee.png", "website": "https://www.vtfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Thursday 10:00 AM-3:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
